reviewtext: This is a great buy if you are looking to split your incoming internet into two, or more, devices.I bought this for my Father, so he could have his PC connected to the internet at the same time as his Roku box.  This was extremely easy to set up, even for a 57 year old who abhors modern day technology--he did it on his own.I would recommend this to anyone looking for a quality, cheaply priced ethernet switch.  If you are looking for an ethernet cable, look at MediaBridge's products, as they are of great quality.
summary: Great to split internet connection into two seperate devices
